Title: Relates to hotel and motel tax in Dutchess county
Summary: Increases the tax the county of Dutchess can impose and collect on the occupancy of hotels, motels, boarding houses, conference centers and tourist homes from 4 percent to 5 percent.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend to amend chapter 208 of the laws of 1983 relating to enabling the county of Dutchess to impose and collect taxes on occupancy of hotel, motel, boarding house, conference center or tourist home in Dutchess county, in relation to authorizing an additional one percent tax
